trans-unit.source: An activity that manages the execution of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> within a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 管理工作流程內 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 執行的活動。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity will not appear in the workflow designer toolbox unless the workflow's project has its `Target Framework` setting set to `.Net Framework 4`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop>活動不會出現在工作流程設計工具的工具箱除非工作流程的專案具有其`Target Framework`設定設為`.Net Framework 4`。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations in the interface types that the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity can support, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> cannot be used directly, but derivative activities created using the Workflow Communication Activity tool (WCA.exe) can be used.
trans-unit.target: 由於 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 活動可支援的介面型別有限，所以無法直接使用<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> 與 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>，但可使用以 [工作流程通訊活動] 工具 (WCA.exe) 所建立的衍生活動。

trans-unit.source: See [Windows Workflow Foundation Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889) for details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[Windows Workflow Foundation 工具](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />, such as an activity’s <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name" /> property, or a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> activity’s <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.While.Condition" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 成對名稱/值的集合，這些成對名稱/值會與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的中繼資料對應，例如活動的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name" /> 屬性，或 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" />活動的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.While.Condition" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The collection of metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 之中繼資料的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the input and output properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得成對名稱/值的集合，這些成對名稱/值會與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的輸入與輸出屬性對應。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input and output properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 輸入和輸出屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the activity contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 所包含之活動的活動型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the activity contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 活動所包含之活動的活動型別。

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此型別必須衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of attributes for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The attribute collection for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 之類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The activity name of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的活動名稱。

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the associated type converter for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的關聯型別轉換器。

trans-unit.source: The type converter for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: Returns the default event for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的預設事件。

trans-unit.source: The default event for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含的<see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的預設事件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: Returns the default property for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default property for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的預設屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.

trans-unit.source: The type of the requested editor.
trans-unit.target: 所要求編輯器的型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the editor for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的編輯器。

trans-unit.source: The editor for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的編輯器。

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of events.
trans-unit.target: 事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The attributes used to filter the returned events.
trans-unit.target: 用來篩選傳回事件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> using the specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of events for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 內含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的事件集合。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> that represents the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示所包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> 之屬性集合的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The array of attributes used to filter the properties.
trans-unit.target: 要用於篩選屬性 (Property) 的屬性 (Attribute) 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回包含之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 所包含 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The property whose owner is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取擁有者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the owner of the specified property descriptor or the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性描述項沒有擁有者的話，則傳回指定屬性描述項的擁有者或 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 活動本身。

trans-unit.source: The property owner or the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性描述項沒有擁有者的話，則為屬性擁有者或 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 活動本身。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
